title: Stunning Park side apartment in luxury concierge building!
posting_body: Tastefully updated, rarely available "S" unit in a marquee building facing Boston Common.
A one bedroom, east-facing apartment on 18th floor with amazing cityscapes!
The apartment features pristine porcelain flooring throughout, brand new HVAC, a beautiful new porcelain tile bath, oversized windows and ample closet space.
The renovated kitchen boasts newer appliances, granite countertops and a pass through.
City views can be enjoyed from almost every angle and are mesmerizing.
Laundry is located just steps away and on every floor.
The building's newly renovated spacious lobby offers a relaxing fire wall.
The halls and amenity spaces have also been recently renovated and complete this picture of urban elegance.
Enjoy the Member's Lounge and Fitness Center which both overlook the relaxing pool and deck area.
The building offers full-time concierge and rental parking is available, guest 'visitor' parking is also available.
